imdb.plot outline: There is a point in every person's life when they contemplate, "What happens when we die?" Consciousness Continues seeks answers to this mystery through first-hand accounts of people who have died, were resuscitated, and have vivid memories of the other side. This series will focus on the continuing impact their near-death experience has had on their lives.
imdb.title: Consciousness Continues
plot: There is a point in every person's life when they contemplate, "What happens when we die?" _Consciousness Continues_ (qv) seeks answers to this mystery through first-hand accounts of people who have died, were resuscitated, and have vivid memories of the other side. This series will focus on the continuing impact their near-death experience has had on their lives.
